attributes.name: style
attributes.value: touch-action: none; user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);

children.content: API reference for Angular Material checkbox

A material design checkbox component. Supports all of the functionality of an HTML5 checkbox, and exposes a similar API. A MatCheckbox can be either checked, unchecked, indeterminate, or disabled. Note that all additional accessibility attributes are taken care of by the component, so there is no need to provide them yourself. However, if you want to omit a label and still have the checkbox be accessible, you may supply an [aria-label] input. See:
Attached to the aria-label attribute of the host element. In most cases, arial-labelledby will take precedence so this may be omitted.
attribute which will be forwarded to the input element
Theme color palette for the component.
Whether the checkbox is disabled. This fully overrides the implementation provided by mixinDisabled, but the mixin is still required because mixinTabIndex requires it.
A unique id for the checkbox input. If none is supplied, it will be auto-generated.

Whether the checkbox is indeterminate. This is also known as "mixed" mode and can be used to represent a checkbox with three states, e.g. a checkbox that represents a nested list of checkable items. Note that whenever checkbox is manually clicked, indeterminate is immediately set to false.
Whether the label should appear after or before the checkbox. Defaults to 'after'
Name value will be applied to the input element if present
The value attribute of the native input element
Returns the unique id for the visual hidden input.
Reference to the ripple instance of the checkbox.
Validator for Material checkbox's required attribute in template-driven checkbox. Current CheckboxRequiredValidator only work with
Change event object emitted by MatCheckbox.
The source MatCheckbox of the event.

Checkbox click action when user click on input element. noop: Do not toggle checked or indeterminate. check: Only toggle checked status, ignore indeterminate. check-indeterminate: Toggle checked status, set indeterminate to false. Default behavior. undefined: Same as
Injection token that can be used to specify the checkbox click behavior.
Code licensed under an MIT-style License.

styles.text: .docs-markdown-pre { border-radius: 5px; display: block; margin: 16px auto; overflow-x: auto; padding: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; }
.docs-header-link a { text-decoration: none; margin-left: -30px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; }

.docs-api table, .docs-markdown-table { border-collapse: collapse; border-radius: 2px; border-spacing: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 32px; width: 100%; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.24) 0px 2px 2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 0px 2px; }
.docs-api th, .docs-markdown-th { font-weight: 400; max-width: 100px; padding: 13px 32px; text-align: left; }
body { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue Light", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Lucida Grande", sans-serif; margin: 0px; }
.docs-primary-header h1 { font-weight: 300; margin: 0px; padding: 28px 8px; font-size: 20px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); }
.mat-badge-content { font-weight: 600; font-size: 12px; font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; }
.mat-h1, .mat-headline, .mat-typography h1 { font: 400 24px/32px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; }
.mat-h2, .mat-title, .mat-typography h2 { font: 500 20px/32px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; }
.mat-h3, .mat-subheading-2, .mat-typography h3 { font: 400 16px/28px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; }
.mat-h4, .mat-subheading-1, .mat-typography h4 { font: 400 15px/24px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; }
.mat-h5, .mat-typography h5 { font: 400 11.62px/20px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 12px; }
.mat-h6, .mat-typography h6 { font: 400 9.38px/20px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 12px; }
.mat-display-4, .mat-typography .mat-display-4 { font: 300 112px/112px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 56px; letter-spacing: -0.05em; }
.mat-display-3, .mat-typography .mat-display-3 { font: 400 56px/56px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 64px; letter-spacing: -0.02em; }
.mat-display-2, .mat-typography .mat-display-2 { font: 400 45px/48px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 64px; letter-spacing: -0.005em; }

.mat-button, .mat-fab, .mat-flat-button, .mat-icon-button, .mat-mini-fab, .mat-raised-button, .mat-stroked-button { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; }
.mat-expansion-panel-header { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 400; }
.mat-form-field { font-size: inherit; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.125; font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; }

.mat-form-field-appearance-legacy.mat-form-field-can-float .mat-input-server:focus + .mat-form-field-label-wrapper .mat-form-field-label, .mat-form-field-appearance-legacy.mat-form-field-can-float.mat-form-field-should-float .mat-form-field-label { transform: translateY(-1.28125em) scale(0.75) perspective(100px) translateZ(0.001px); width: 133.333%; }

.mat-form-field-appearance-legacy.mat-form-field-can-float .mat-form-field-autofill-control:-webkit-autofill + .mat-form-field-label-wrapper .mat-form-field-label { transform: translateY(-1.28125em) scale(0.75) perspective(100px) translateZ(0.00101px); width: 133.333%; }
.mat-grid-tile-footer .mat-line, .mat-grid-tile-header .mat-line { white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: block; box-sizing: border-box; }
.mat-menu-item { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; }
.mat-slider-thumb-label-text { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 500; }
.mat-tab-label, .mat-tab-link { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; }
.mat-toolbar, .mat-toolbar h1, .mat-toolbar h2, .mat-toolbar h3, .mat-toolbar h4, .mat-toolbar h5, .mat-toolbar h6 { font: 500 20px/32px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; margin: 0px; }
.mat-tooltip { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 10px; padding-top: 6px; padding-bottom: 6px; }

.mat-list .mat-list-item .mat-line, .mat-nav-list .mat-list-item .mat-line, .mat-selection-list .mat-list-item .mat-line { white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: block; box-sizing: border-box; }

.mat-list .mat-list-option .mat-line, .mat-nav-list .mat-list-option .mat-line, .mat-selection-list .mat-list-option .mat-line { white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: block; box-sizing: border-box; }

.mat-list[dense] .mat-list-item .mat-line, .mat-nav-list[dense] .mat-list-item .mat-line, .mat-selection-list[dense] .mat-list-item .mat-line { white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: block; box-sizing: border-box; }

.mat-list[dense] .mat-list-option .mat-line, .mat-nav-list[dense] .mat-list-option .mat-line, .mat-selection-list[dense] .mat-list-option .mat-line { white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: block; box-sizing: border-box; }

.mat-list[dense] .mat-subheader, .mat-nav-list[dense] .mat-subheader, .mat-selection-list[dense] .mat-subheader { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 500; }
.mat-option { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); }
.mat-optgroup-label { font: 500 14px/24px Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54); }
.mat-simple-snackbar-action { line-height: 1; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: 500; }

.mat-ripple-element { position: absolute; border-radius: 50%; pointer-events: none; transition: opacity 0s ease 0s, transform 0s cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s, -webkit-transform 0s cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s; transform: scale(0); }

.cdk-visually-hidden { border: 0px; clip: rect(0px, 0px, 0px, 0px); height: 1px; margin: -1px; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; position: absolute; width: 1px; outline: 0px; -webkit-appearance: none; }
.cdk-global-overlay-wrapper, .cdk-overlay-container { pointer-events: none; top: 0px; left: 0px; height: 100%; width: 100%; }
.cdk-overlay-pane { position: absolute; pointer-events: auto; box-sizing: border-box; z-index: 1000; display: flex; max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%; }

.cdk-overlay-backdrop { position: absolute; top: 0px; bottom: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; z-index: 1000; pointer-events: auto; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; transition: opacity 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1) 0s; opacity: 0; }
.cdk-overlay-connected-position-bounding-box { position: absolute; z-index: 1000; display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-width: 1px; min-height: 1px; }
textarea.cdk-textarea-autosize-measuring { height: auto !important; overflow: hidden !important; padding: 2px 0px !important; box-sizing: content-box !important; }

.mat-badge-content { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background: rgb(63, 81, 181); position: absolute; text-align: center; display: inline-block; border-radius: 50%; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out 0s, -webkit-transform 0.2s ease-in-out 0s; transform: scale(0.6); overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; pointer-events: none; }

.mat-bottom-sheet-container { box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 8px 10px -5px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 16px 24px 2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 6px 30px 5px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); }
.mat-button-toggle-group-appearance-standard.mat-button-toggle-vertical .mat-button-toggle + .mat-button-toggle { border-left: none; border-right: none; border-top: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12); }
.mat-table tbody, .mat-table tfoot, .mat-table thead, .mat-table-sticky, [mat-footer-row], [mat-header-row], [mat-row], mat-footer-row, mat-header-row, mat-row { background: inherit; }
mat-footer-row, mat-header-row, mat-row, td.mat-cell, td.mat-footer-cell, th.mat-header-cell { border-bottom-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12); }

.mat-datepicker-content { box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 2px 4px -1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 4px 5px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 1px 10px 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); }

.mat-dialog-container { box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 11px 15px -7px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 24px 38px 3px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 9px 46px 8px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); }

.mat-form-field-appearance-legacy.mat-form-field-disabled .mat-form-field-underline { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.42) 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.42) 33%, transparent 0px); background-size: 4px 100%; background-repeat: repeat-x; }

.mat-form-field-appearance-standard.mat-form-field-disabled .mat-form-field-underline { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.42) 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.42) 33%, transparent 0px); background-size: 4px 100%; background-repeat: repeat-x; }

.mat-list .mat-subheader, .mat-nav-list .mat-subheader, .mat-selection-list .mat-subheader { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54); }
.mat-paginator-decrement, .mat-paginator-increment { border-top: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54); border-right: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54); }
.mat-slide-toggle-thumb { box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 2px 1px -1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 1px 1px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 1px 3px 0px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250); }
.mat-slider-horizontal .mat-slider-ticks { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7) 2px, transparent 0px, transparent); }
.mat-tree { font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); }

.mat-snack-bar-container { color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); background: rgb(50, 50, 50); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 3px 5px -1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 6px 10px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 1px 18px 0px; }
.docs-component-viewer-nav-content hr { border-right: none; border-bottom: none; border-left: none; border-image: initial; border-top: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); }
app-component-viewer, app-component-viewer .mat-tab-label:focus, guide-viewer, guide-viewer .mat-tab-label:focus { color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); }
example-viewer .docs-example-viewer-wrapper { border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.24) 0px 2px 2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 0px 2px; margin: 4px; }
example-viewer .docs-example-source { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12); overflow: auto; }

.hljs { display: block; overflow-x: auto; padding: 1em; background: rgb(250, 250, 250); color: rgb(55, 71, 79); -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; text-size-adjust: 100%; font: 300 14px/1 "Roboto Mono", monospace; }
material-docs-app { display: flex; flex-direction: column; position: absolute; top: 56px; bottom: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; }
app-navbar { position: fixed; top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; z-index: 2; }
material-docs-app > app-guides, material-docs-app > app-homepage, material-docs-app > guide-viewer { overflow-y: auto; }
.docs-navbar-header[_ngcontent-c1] { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: center; padding: 8px 16px; }

.mat-button, .mat-flat-button, .mat-icon-button, .mat-stroked-button { box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; user-select: none; cursor: pointer; outline: 0px; border: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: center; margin: 0px; min-width: 64px; line-height: 36px; padding: 0px 16px; border-radius: 4px; overflow: visible; }

.mat-raised-button { box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; user-select: none; cursor: pointer; outline: 0px; border: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: center; margin: 0px; min-width: 64px; line-height: 36px; padding: 0px 16px; border-radius: 4px; overflow: visible; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: background 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1) 0s, box-shadow 280ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s; }
._mat-animation-noopable.mat-raised-button { transition: none 0s ease 0s; animation: none 0s ease 0s 1 normal none running; }

.mat-fab { box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; user-select: none; cursor: pointer; outline: 0px; border: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: center; margin: 0px; line-height: 36px; overflow: visible; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: background 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1) 0s, box-shadow 280ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s; min-width: 0px; border-radius: 50%; width: 56px; height: 56px; padding: 0px; flex-shrink: 0; }
._mat-animation-noopable.mat-fab { transition: none 0s ease 0s; animation: none 0s ease 0s 1 normal none running; }

.mat-mini-fab { box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; user-select: none; cursor: pointer; outline: 0px; border: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: center; margin: 0px; line-height: 36px; overflow: visible; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: background 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1) 0s, box-shadow 280ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s; min-width: 0px; border-radius: 50%; width: 40px; height: 40px; padding: 0px; flex-shrink: 0; }
._mat-animation-noopable.mat-mini-fab { transition: none 0s ease 0s; animation: none 0s ease 0s 1 normal none running; }
.mat-icon-button { padding: 0px; min-width: 0px; width: 40px; height: 40px; flex-shrink: 0; line-height: 40px; border-radius: 50%; }
.mat-button-focus-overlay, .mat-button-ripple.mat-ripple { top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; position: absolute; pointer-events: none; border-radius: inherit; }
.mat-button-focus-overlay { opacity: 0; transition: opacity 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.35, 0, 0.25, 1) 0s, background-color 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.35, 0, 0.25, 1) 0s; }

.mat-form-field:not(.mat-form-field-appearance-legacy) .mat-form-field-prefix .mat-icon-button, .mat-form-field:not(.mat-form-field-appearance-legacy) .mat-form-field-suffix .mat-icon-button { display: block; font-size: inherit; width: 2.5em; height: 2.5em; }
.docs-theme-picker-menu .docs-theme-picker-swatch { position: relative; width: 36px; height: 36px; margin: 6px; border-radius: 50%; overflow: hidden; }
.docs-theme-picker-menu .docs-theme-picker-swatch .docs-theme-chosen-icon { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); position: absolute; left: 50%; top: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); }

.docs-theme-picker-menu .docs-theme-picker-swatch::after { content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); border-radius: 50%; }
.mat-icon { background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; fill: currentcolor; height: 24px; width: 24px; }
.mat-icon.mat-icon-inline { font-size: inherit; height: inherit; line-height: inherit; width: inherit; }
.mat-menu-panel { min-width: 112px; max-width: 280px; overflow: auto; max-height: calc(100vh - 48px); border-radius: 4px; outline: 0px; }

.mat-menu-item { user-select: none; cursor: pointer; outline: 0px; border: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: block; line-height: 48px; height: 48px; padding: 0px 16px; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; max-width: 100%; position: relative; }

.mat-menu-item-submenu-trigger::after { width: 0px; height: 0px; border-style: solid; border-width: 5px 0px 5px 5px; border-color: transparent transparent transparent currentcolor; content: ""; display: inline-block; position: absolute; top: 50%; right: 16px; transform: translateY(-50%); }
[dir="rtl"] .mat-menu-item-submenu-trigger::after { right: auto; left: 16px; transform: rotateY(180deg) translateY(-50%); }
.mat-menu-item .mat-menu-ripple { top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; position: absolute; pointer-events: none; }
.mat-grid-tile { display: block; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; }
.mat-grid-tile .mat-figure { top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; position: absolute; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; height: 100%; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; }

.mat-grid-tile .mat-grid-tile-footer, .mat-grid-tile .mat-grid-tile-header { display: flex; align-items: center; height: 48px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.38); overflow: hidden; padding: 0px 16px; position: absolute; left: 0px; right: 0px; }
.mat-grid-tile .mat-grid-list-text { display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow: hidden; }

.docs-component-viewer-nav .docs-component-viewer-nav-content button { padding: 10px 15px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 16px; margin: 0px; font-size: 13px; cursor: pointer; position: relative; display: block; width: 100%; text-align: left; background: 0px 0px; border: none; }
.docs-component-viewer-nav .docs-component-viewer-nav-content ul { list-style-type: none; margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; overflow: hidden; }
.mat-drawer-container { position: relative; z-index: 1; box-sizing: border-box; display: block; overflow: hidden; }
.mat-drawer-container[fullscreen] { top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; position: absolute; }
.mat-drawer-backdrop { top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; position: absolute; display: block; z-index: 3; visibility: hidden; }
.mat-drawer-transition .mat-drawer-backdrop { transition-duration: 0.4s; transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1); transition-property: background-color, visibility; }
.mat-drawer-content { position: relative; z-index: 1; display: block; height: 100%; overflow: auto; }
.mat-drawer-transition .mat-drawer-content { transition-duration: 0.4s; transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1); transition-property: transform, margin-left, margin-right; }
.mat-drawer { display: block; position: absolute; top: 0px; bottom: 0px; z-index: 3; outline: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-y: auto; transform: translate3d(-100%, 0px, 0px); }
.sidenav-toggle[_ngcontent-c13] mat-icon[_ngcontent-c13] { font-size: 30px; height: 64px; width: 64px; line-height: 64px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); }

.docs-footer-copyright[_ngcontent-c14] { display: flex; flex: 1 1 0%; justify-content: flex-end; flex-direction: column; min-width: 225px; text-align: center; }

.docs-component-viewer-content component-api, .docs-component-viewer-content component-overview { display: flex; align-items: flex-start; }

.mat-tab-link { height: 48px; padding: 0px 24px; cursor: pointer; box-sizing: border-box; opacity: 0.6; min-width: 160px; text-align: center; display: inline-flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: top; text-decoration: none; position: relative; overflow: hidden; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; }
.mat-tab-link .mat-tab-label-content { display: inline-flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; white-space: nowrap; }
.mat-ink-bar { position: absolute; bottom: 0px; height: 2px; transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.35, 0, 0.25, 1) 0s; }

mutations.name: class
mutations.val: docs-component-viewer-section-tab mat-tab-link ng-star-inserted cdk-focused cdk-mouse-focused mat-tab-label-active

children.content: API reference for Angular Material checkbox

A material design checkbox component. Supports all of the functionality of an HTML5 checkbox, and exposes a similar API. A MatCheckbox can be either checked, unchecked, indeterminate, or disabled. Note that all additional accessibility attributes are taken care of by the component, so there is no need to provide them yourself. However, if you want to omit a label and still have the checkbox be accessible, you may supply an [aria-label] input. See:
Attached to the aria-label attribute of the host element. In most cases, arial-labelledby will take precedence so this may be omitted.
attribute which will be forwarded to the input element
Theme color palette for the component.
Whether the checkbox is disabled. This fully overrides the implementation provided by mixinDisabled, but the mixin is still required because mixinTabIndex requires it.
A unique id for the checkbox input. If none is supplied, it will be auto-generated.

Whether the checkbox is indeterminate. This is also known as "mixed" mode and can be used to represent a checkbox with three states, e.g. a checkbox that represents a nested list of checkable items. Note that whenever checkbox is manually clicked, indeterminate is immediately set to false.
Whether the label should appear after or before the checkbox. Defaults to 'after'
Name value will be applied to the input element if present
The value attribute of the native input element
Returns the unique id for the visual hidden input.
Reference to the ripple instance of the checkbox.
Validator for Material checkbox's required attribute in template-driven checkbox. Current CheckboxRequiredValidator only work with
Change event object emitted by MatCheckbox.
The source MatCheckbox of the event.

Checkbox click action when user click on input element. noop: Do not toggle checked or indeterminate. check: Only toggle checked status, ignore indeterminate. check-indeterminate: Toggle checked status, set indeterminate to false. Default behavior. undefined: Same as
Injection token that can be used to specify the checkbox click behavior.

enhanced with Material Design styling and animations.

element. The label can be positioned before or after the checkbox by setting the
If you don't want the label to appear next to the checkbox, you can use
property of the checkbox is true, it will render as indeterminate regardless of the
value. Any interaction with the checkbox by a user (i.e., clicking) will remove the indeterminate state.
. This behavior can be customized by
value. Developers have the power to implement customized click actions.

. This matches the behavior of native

to provide an accessible experience. This internal checkbox receives focus and is automatically labelled by the text content of the
